name: Red and Yellow
detailed_description:
Red and Yellow is a game that tests your reflexes as well as your memory and your ability to think fast.
There is a Path composed by red and yellow platforms, and on the bot of the screen, a red and a yellow button. You need to push the button with the same color of the next platform.
But be carefull, not only failing on the color means losing the game, there is also a increased difficult while the game goes on, and the color buttons often dissapear too.

What to expect:

-Extreme fast gameplay that testes your reflexes.

-Funny and ejoyable gameplay, as well as infinite gameplay.
